model.name: prevent-any-type---use-proper-typescript-types
model.title: Prevent Any Type - Use Proper TypeScript Types
model.description: The 'any' type must be avoided wherever possible. All data should have proper TypeScript interfaces or types. For example, 'model: any' should be 'model: Model' with a defined Model interface. Use 'unknown' when type is truly unknown and add type guards. Exceptions only with documented justification.
